*This article is about a previous release of [Crawl](/Crawl "Crawl"). For information about other versions of Crawl, including the newest, see [List of Stone Soup versions](/List_of_Stone_Soup_versions "List of Stone Soup versions").*

**0.21** is a version of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*. It was released on January 5, 2018.

***

## Contents

- [1 Highlights](#Highlights)
- [2 Branches, Environment](#Branches.2C_Environment)
- [3 Character](#Character)
- [4 Gods](#Gods)
- [5 Interface](#Interface)
- [6 Items](#Items)
- [7 Monsters](#Monsters)
- [8 Spells](#Spells)

## Highlights

- New species: [Gnolls](/Gnoll "Gnoll")
- New god: [Wu Jian Council](/Wu_Jian_Council "Wu Jian Council")
- New spell: [Borgnjor's Vile Clutch](/Borgnjor%27s_Vile_Clutch "Borgnjor's Vile Clutch")

## Branches, Environment

- The rate at which unique Pan lord levels appear in [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") is increased.
- [Transporters](/Transporter "Transporter") now have a 'landing site' that indicates their destination.
- The Hellbinder and Cloud Mage [Wizlabs](/Wizlab "Wizlab") have been revamped to give greater and more varied challenges as well as improved loot.

## Character

- New species: [Gnolls](/Gnoll "Gnoll"), with extremely high aptitudes for all skills, but an inability to focus: Gnolls always train all skills equally, regardless of whether they have the requisite items or spells.
- [Ogres](/Ogre "Ogre") now have better aptitudes in [short blades](/Short_blades "Short blades"), [long blades](/Long_blades "Long blades"), and [axes](/Axes "Axes").

## Gods

- New (temple) god: [Wu Jian Council](/Wu_Jian_Council "Wu Jian Council")

  - Grants free 'martial' attacks from certain movement actions:

    - 0\*: Moving toward an enemy triggers 'Lunge', which attacks the enemy and does extra damage.
    - 1\*: Moving between tiles adjacent to a monster triggers 'Whirlwind', which attacks all adjacent foes and 'pins' them, preventing one turn of movement.
    - 2\*: Moving against solid obstacles triggers a two-turn Wall Jump, moving two tiles in the opposite direction and attacking any adjacent enemies. This ability can also be triggered via an (a)bility, and the movement- based mode can be disabled using \`wall\_jump\_move = false\` in your rc file for more careful play.
    - 3\*: Active 'Serpent's Lash' ability, granting two free movement actions, of which any martial actions will never miss.
    - 5\*: Active 'Heavenly Storm' ability, creating opaque clouds and increasing your martial prowess while you continue to use 'martial' attacks.
    - Piety is gained through defeating foes.

- [Gozag](/Gozag "Gozag") Potion Petition no longer offers haste/berserk potions for species that can't haste/berserk.

- [Zin](/Zin "Zin") blocks 100% of mutations at 6\* piety. At that piety level, potions of mutation now only remove mutations and don't cause piety loss.

- Zin no longer has a mutation removal one-time ability at 6\* piety.

- [Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb")'s Minor Destruction has slightly lowered range, and Makhleb's Major Destruction has slightly increased range.

## Interface

- Players can now set training targets for [skills](/Skills "Skills").

  - Press = on the skill screen, select a skill, and enter a skill level.
  - Training of that skill is disabled when it reaches the specified level.

- Water species except for [merfolk](/Merfolk "Merfolk") [autoexplore](/Autoexplore "Autoexplore")/travel through shallow water.

- Diagonal shift-running now stops properly at doors.

- [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") players now show their hat tiles in Tiles/WebTiles.

- New 'tc\_forbidden' RC option to set color of squares forbidden by travel.

- New xp\_by\_level morgue table to track XP sources on a per-level basis.

- New -force-map objstat/mapstat option to always place a given map on each level.

- New objstat fields for tracking monster numbers/XP from vaults.

- Many new tiles for artefact weapons and monsters.

## Items

- [Wands](/Wands "Wands") of the same type merge charges upon pickup and wands have no cap on charges.

- Wands [identify](/Identify "Identify") charges upon pickup and are destroyed when their last charge is used.

- [Items](/Items "Items") in a doorways no longer prevent closing doors in most instances.

  - Items get pushed out of the doorway when the player closes the door.
  - Doors refuse to close only if the items would fall into deep [water](/Water "Water") or [lava](/Lava "Lava").

- [Potions of mutations](/Potion_of_mutation "Potion of mutation") remove fewer mutations on average and are a bit rarer.

- [Fan of gales](/Fan_of_gales "Fan of gales") now disperses clouds at the user's location.

- Un-equipping an item currently giving you [invisibility](/Invisibility_\(ego\) "Invisibility (ego)") now gives extra contamination.

- [Lightning rods](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod") XP-recharge even when only partially used and only grant a power bonus for shots over consecutive turns.

- [Scarves](/Scarf "Scarf") are never made as artefacts.

- [Wands of random effects](/Wands_of_random_effects "Wands of random effects") include malmutate in the set of possible effects.

- Permanent [food](/Food "Food") has been simplified.

  - [Rations](/Ration "Ration") are now the only type of permanent food, replacing bread and meat rations, fruit, and royal jelly.
  - Ration item generation and well as the herbivore and carnivore mutations have been balanced to keep available nutrition the same as before.
  - [Fedhas](/Fedhas "Fedhas") abilities that formerly required a piece of fruit instead require two rations.

- Removed:

  - [Wands of confusion](/Wands_of_confusion "Wands of confusion") and [lightning](/Wand_of_lightning "Wand of lightning").
  - [Scrolls of recharging](/Scrolls_of_recharging "Scrolls of recharging").
  - Mutagenic [chunks](/Chunk "Chunk").

## Monsters

- [Monsters](/Monsters "Monsters") no longer spawn after level-generation in most places.

  - This also eliminates the "super OOD" timer that could generate exceptionally hard monsters after a long time on the level.
  - The number of monsters created during level generation is increased slightly to compensate.
  - [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") and [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss") are unaffected by this change.

- A fraction of the monsters generated with a level are created awake, but never near stairs.

- [Air elementals](/Air_elemental "Air elemental") now have a Vortex ability, which creates a short-range, short-duration tornado effect.

- [Player ghosts](/Player_ghost "Player ghost") have normal speed regardless of species, never have a chaos ego on their melee attack, and no longer generate in portal branches.

- [Pandemonium lords](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord") can no longer have the [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter") spell.

## Spells

- New spell: [Borgnjor's Vile Clutch](/Borgnjor%27s_Vile_Clutch "Borgnjor's Vile Clutch") (L5 Necromancy/Earth); calls forth undead hands from the earth over a smite-targeted area to constrict hostile monsters. Appears in the [Necromancer](/Necromancer "Necromancer") [starting book](/Book_of_Necromancy "Book of Necromancy"), the [book of Unlife](/Book_of_Unlife "Book of Unlife"), and the [book of Dreams](/Book_of_Dreams "Book of Dreams").

- [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter")'s damage has been simplified to use one of three dice values for susceptibility, and can now slightly damage [insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial") monsters. Intrinsic player/monster susceptibility takes precedence for damage over [flight](/Flight "Flight") status.

- [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") now gives each material type a fixed explosion damage and size that doesn't increase when a wall is destroyed.

- Removed:

  - [Control Undead](/Control_Undead "Control Undead").
  - [Cigotuvi's Embrace](/Cigotuvi%27s_Embrace "Cigotuvi's Embrace").
